idea:
We provide Quality education with Creative learning environment, where kids can learn, play and grow together as well as explore the endless possibilities the life has to offer.


Our core mission is to generate leaders of the next generation. For a child to become a good leader, it is important for him to become a Good person. And that goal can only achieved in the pre-school level education where children are instilled with core moral life values.


To make your child a good person

To make your child a creative person

To get your child ready for formal schooling
name: PRINCE INTERNATIONAL PRE-SCHOOL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Anwesha Hygiene Pvt. Ltd, Mumbai, gives immense pleasure to introduce you wide range of Pest Control Services and Hygiene Products to commercial & Residential properties. With industry experience of more than two decades, we believe in ethical business practices and have considerable transparency in all spheres of dealings.

Ever since our inception, we have been giving paramount importance to the quality of our services. We bring a fresh and innovative approach to Pest Control Industry with modern technologies and well trained expertise. We offer our Services and Products to domestic as well as different industrial sectors like residence, industries, corporate, hotels, restaurants, food factory, farm house and hospitals. Our Pest Control Services and Products are widely acclaimed by our clients owing to their timely and effective execution, optimum results, eco friendly chemicals and safety from any kinds of hazards. While rendering the services, we prime focus on eradication of breeding sources, restricting pest entry and removal of various harbour areas of variety of insects & pests with active cooperation from skilled and trained management.

We have various inspection methods undertaken by our quality experts to ensure hassle free service to our valued clients. Our Services and Products are tested at every level to make sure that these are Eco friendly and less toxic.

We have mustered fruitful and healthy relationships with our clients over the course of time, in return to our unmatched quality standards, timeliness and unwavering services. We have been meticulously attending to our client’s requirements and even offer them services as and when needed.
name: ANWESHA HYGIENE PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Nitin Bhoir

idea:
Midway Cargo & Logistics (MCL), started in the year 2016, with highly skilled and professional recruits is pioneer among developing and organizing a well – networked chain for courier-cargo & logistics services. We have started this company with explicit motive of providing 100% satisfaction to our customers and our clients. We have successfully managed to setup a large PAN network base all over India. To provide high quality services to our clients is our primary concern. Our team includes visionary professionals who are having over 200 man years of rich experience in the field of cargo & logistics industry.

We operate in a most professional, punctual and prompt way to satisfy our customers. We fully exploit the technology to support our operations and other activities to meet our customer requirements. The provision of providing a robust and effective online system is our strength. We offer a highly equipped Track – n – Trace facility in our system to carry smooth process for delivery of shipments. The centralized back –up ensures an appropriate disaster management system with efficient management information and analytical tools, its mobility and abundant use of messaging tools ensures a fast communication module which plays a vital role in logistics industry. As we have created a modern infrastructure to support our vast network across, you can safely place your trust on MCL and hire our hassle-free, time-friendly logistic services across India.

We cater to provide overall logistics solutions to our clients, placing one stop solutions for all courier, cargo & logistics related matter, our services are mentioned as under:-

1. Last Mile Services

2. 24 Hrs Express Delivery Service

3. FTL Service

4. Warehouse

5. Ocean Freight

6. Air Freight
name: MIDWAY CARGO & LOGISTICS PVT LTD
